creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
The enable/disable state of the Squiggle toolbar buttons is not working.  

Reason: Setting the text for toolbar buttons is causing a
MissingResourceException error for the majority of buttons which don't have
text, which results in subsequent code that attaches the relevant Action to the
button not to be executed.

The patch just moves in the exception handling for the MissingResourceException,
so that the subsequent Action-attaching code will process regardless of whether
there is defined text for the Button.

This can be run independently of the other Squiggle patch; they modify different
files.

Thanks for applying both patches!

Glen
creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
